# Integrating ChatGPT in Lectures

## Integration

-   Make a platform with predefined prompts.

## Example of predefined prompts

**Prompt**
<html>
<head>
    <style>
        .container {
            line-height: 1.5;
            color: grey;
            font-size: 20px;
            font-style: italic;
            border: 1px dashed black;
            padding: 10px;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <div class="container">
[Insert text] <br>
Create flashcards for studying based on the text above. Please make as many flashcards as you think are necessary. Use this structure:<br>
<strong>Flashcard 1:</strong><br>
Question: ...<br>
Answer: ...'<br>
    </div>
</body>
</html>
